title: Hulu Live TV now offers free unlimited DVR, just like YouTube TV
content:
Hulu is probably best known for its on-demand streaming library of movies and TV shows, but it also offers a Live TV service comparable to YouTube TV, DirecTV Stream, or Sling TV. Like some of its competitors, Hulu offered more expensive TV plans with cloud storage for DVR recordings, but now the company is ditching

The post Hulu Live TV now offers free unlimited DVR, just like YouTube TV appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Hulu with Live TV won't charge extra for more DVR storage starting April 13, matching the unlimited DVR offered by YouTube TV.
